definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: Objective To study the mechanism of acute leukemic bone marrow stroma in leukemia development.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨白血病骨髓基质对白血病形成的作用机制。

sentences.english: Objective To study the mechanism of acute leukemic bone marrow stroma in leukemia development.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨白血病骨髓基质对白血病形成的作用机制。

sentences.english: The culture supernatant of tumor cell lines was not cytoxic.
sentences.chinese: 白血病细胞培养上清液无细胞毒作用。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the therapeutic effects of platelet transfusion in acute leukemic patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨急性白血病患者反复输注血小板的治疗效果。

sentences.english: Which does upper agony of body show leukaemic mainly in the field of?
sentences.chinese: 白血病患者身体上的痛苦主要表现在哪些方面？

sentences.english: Objective To study the immunophenotypic heterogeneity of acute leukemia in elderly.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨老年人急性白血病的免疫表型特点。

sentences.english: ConclusionMangiferin sulfonate sodium has good antilelkemia effect in vitro and vivo.
sentences.chinese: 结论芒果苷磺酸钠有较好的体内外抗白血病作用。

sentences.english: Zhou was diagnosed with leukaemia and cannot attend class.
sentences.chinese: 后周建被诊断患有白血病，因此不能再继续学业。

sentences.english: Thus the nursing of perineum is one of the important contents of preventing leukemia infection.
sentences.chinese: 故会阴的护理是预防白血病感染的重要内容之一。

sentences.english: Autologous bone marrow transplantation (ABMT ) is an alternative effective treatment for acute leukemias.
sentences.chinese: 自体骨髓移植是治疗急性白血病的有效方法之一。

sentences.english: Avian leukosis in egg-type chickens is infectious neoplastic disease caused by avian leukosis viruse subgroup J( ALV-J).
sentences.chinese: 蛋鸡J亚群禽白血病是病毒引起的肿瘤性传染病。

sentences.english: Electrolyzed reduced water induces differentiation in K562 human leukemia cells.
sentences.chinese: 电解还原水使人体白血病细胞分化成巨核细胞。

sentences.english: And jamie was sent into the hospital, and results show began hemorrhaging uncontrollably.
sentences.chinese: 亚纪被送进医院，结果证明患了急性白血病。

sentences.english: Occupational exposure to mercury also has not been associated with leukaemia.
sentences.chinese: 职业性暴露于汞也与白血病没有相关性。

sentences.english: At high power, the bone marrow of a patient with acute myelogenous leukemia is seen here.
sentences.chinese: 在高倍镜下，见到的是急性髓母细胞白血病骨髓。

sentences.english: The organization raises money for leukemia and lymphoma research.
sentences.chinese: 那组织为白血病和淋巴瘤研究筹集资金。

definition: cancers of the nose and throat/nasopharyngeal carcinoma (NPC)
